title: Helpers: personalising the instruction of reading (TEFC)
creator_contributor_role: KTEH-TV (Television station : San Jose, Calif.), production company

description: Demonstrates the use of supportive personnel in individualising instruction and meeting the needs of students. Illustrates the process used to prepare teachers to work with volunteers, and the professional relationship which exists between the principal, teachers and volunteers.
